title: Bring back the real lore
body: Recently rito has been shortening the lore of the champions in the league. I personally really enjoy reading the champion lore while waiting for a game, but in the recent patches quite a few of them have gone missing. Riot pls bring them back

replies.body: The problem is rito has gone "we want fancy video, but we really don't care to actually write a decent story for it."
Not the case since some champions have had lores changed from very detailed to half a paragraph, which makes no sense at all. I am cool with alternative, short lores, but don't remove the good ones.
Yeah what i am meaning is that cause they cbf writting lore, they decided to delete the lore and make it all based on %%%%ty videos
So because they can't be bothered they delete a lore and write a new short one instead of leaving it how it is? :|
Yeah cause then they'd have to morph their videos to match the lore.

Ah yeah, I get you now. 
I don't understand why the writers at Riot aren't ashamed of themselves.
They are, they just get paid to hide it.

Problem is Riot is too lazy to care for lore, literally.
Did I mention the retcon too?
They are handling the lore in such a shi**y way at the moment.
Season 1 when they had the journals of justice, and the Ionia VS Noxus match, that was the only time lore remotely mattered to Riot.
